languages.text: {n}Префект складывает руки в молитвенном жесте.{/n} "Леди Теодора любила секреты... и умела их хранить. Взойдя на ее трон, вы стали правопреемни{mf|ком|цей} в обладании ими... но их столь много, что оповестить вас разом обо всех просто не представляется возможным... как и определить, что вам уже известно, а что нет".

{n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."
languages.original_text: {n}Префект складывает руки в молитвенном жесте.{/n} "Леди Теодора любила секреты... и умела их хранить. Взойдя на ее трон, вы стали правопреемни{mf|ком|цей} в обладании ими... но их столь много, что оповестить вас разом обо всех просто не представляется возможным... как и определить, что вам уже известно, а что нет".

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of everything would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

{n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of everything would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

{n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

{n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

{n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

{n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

languages.text: {n}La préfète joint les mains.{/n} « Dame Théodora n'aimait rien tant que les secrets... et l'art de la dissimulation était chez elle une seconde nature. Si vous avez hérité de ces secrets en lui succédant... ils sont si nombreux qu'il serait impossible de tous vous les divulguer, comme le prouve le peu que vous en savez actuellement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète joint les mains.{/n} « Dame Théodora n'aimait rien tant que les secrets... et l'art de la dissimulation était chez elle une seconde nature. Si vous avez hérité de ces secrets en lui succédant... ils sont si nombreux qu'il serait impossible de tous vous les divulguer, comme le prouve le peu que vous en savez actuellement. »

languages.text: {n}La prefecta entrelaza las manos.{/n} «A lady Theodora le gustaban los secretos... y se le daba bien guardarlos. Usted los heredó al ascender a su trono, pero hay tantos que informarl{mf|e|a} sobre todos ellos sería imposible, al igual que lo es determinar sus conocimientos actuales».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta entrelaza las manos.{/n} «A lady Theodora le gustaban los secretos... y se le daba bien guardarlos. Usted los heredó al ascender a su trono, pero hay tantos que informarl{mf|e|a} sobre todos ellos sería imposible, al igual que lo es determinar sus conocimientos actuales».

languages.text: {n}行政官握紧了双手。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人喜欢秘密……也同样擅长保守秘密。当您继承她的王位时，这些秘密也同样归您所有……然而，她知晓的秘密实在是太多了。若要把这些秘密全部告知于您，恐怕是件不切实际的事情，因此只能部分告知。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官握紧了双手。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人喜欢秘密……也同样擅长保守秘密。当您继承她的王位时，这些秘密也同样归您所有……然而，她知晓的秘密实在是太多了。若要把这些秘密全部告知于您，恐怕是件不切实际的事情，因此只能部分告知。”

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin klatscht in die Hände.{/n} "Lady Theodora mochte Geheimnisse ... und wusste sie zu wahren. Ihr habt diese Geheimnisse bei Eurer Thronbesteigung geerbt ... allerdings gibt es derer so viele, dass Ihr sie unmöglich alle kennen könnt."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin klatscht in die Hände.{/n} "Lady Theodora mochte Geheimnisse ... und wusste sie zu wahren. Ihr habt diese Geheimnisse bei Eurer Thronbesteigung geerbt ... allerdings gibt es derer so viele, dass Ihr sie unmöglich alle kennen könnt."

languages.text: {n}総監は両手を組み合わせる。{/n}「レディ・シオドーラは秘密が好きでしたし、秘密を守るのも上手でした。あなたが彼女の王位を継承した時からこうした秘密を引き継いだのです。しかし、秘密が多すぎて、あなたの知識にも限界があるようにそれらすべてをあなたに知らせることは無理なことだったでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は両手を組み合わせる。{/n}「レディ・シオドーラは秘密が好きでしたし、秘密を守るのも上手でした。あなたが彼女の王位を継承した時からこうした秘密を引き継いだのです。しかし、秘密が多すぎて、あなたの知識にも限界があるようにそれらすべてをあなたに知らせることは無理なことだったでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Prefekt ellerini kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora, sırlara düşkündü... Sır saklamakta iyiydi de. Tahtına oturduğunuzda onun sırlarını devraldınız. Ancak o kadar çok sır mevcut ki hepsini anlatmak, ne kadarını bildiğinizi ölçmek kadar imkânsız olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect clasps her hands.{/n} "Lady Theodora was fond of secrets... and good at keeping them. You inherited those secrets when you ascended her throne... but there are so many of them that apprising you of them all would be an impossible task, as is determining the scope of your knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt ellerini kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora, sırlara düşkündü... Sır saklamakta iyiydi de. Tahtına oturduğunuzda onun sırlarını devraldınız. Ancak o kadar çok sır mevcut ki hepsini anlatmak, ne kadarını bildiğinizi ölçmek kadar imkânsız olurdu."
